verses.text: \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* thence \w and|strong="H1004"\w* fled \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cave|strong="H4631"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Odollam. \w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H3381"\w*, \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* thither;

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w distress|strong="H4689"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* oppressed \w with|strong="H5973"\w* debt, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* affliction \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w mind|strong="H5315"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w* unto \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w prince|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w departed|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* thence \w into|strong="H0413"\w* Maspha \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* tarry \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w left|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w under|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hold.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: \w Abide|strong="H3427"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* hold, depart, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Juda. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w departed|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Haret.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* seen, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Now|strong="H3588"\w* whilst \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Gabaa, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wood, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* Rama, \w having|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*,

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, ye \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jemini: \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Isai \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* tribunes, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* centurions:

\w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w inform|strong="H1540"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w especially|strong="H0853"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* hath entered \w into|strong="H1540"\w* league \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* soil \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Isai? \w There|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* pitieth \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w case|strong="H3588"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* giveth \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* information: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* hath \w raised|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, plotting \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Doeg|strong="H1673"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Edomite|strong="H0130"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* chief \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, answering, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Isai, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Nobe \w with|strong="H0413"\w* Achimelech \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Achitob \w the|strong="H0853"\w* priest.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* consulted \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H7592"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* victuals, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Goliath|strong="H1555"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* Achimelech \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Achitob, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* Nobe, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Achimelech: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Achitob. \w He|strong="H0559"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Here|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H2005"\w*, \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, thou, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Isai, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* hast consulted \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, continuing \w a|strong="H5414"\w* traitor \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* Achimelech answering \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* amongst \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w so|strong="H5493"\w* \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w as|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* son \w in|strong="H0413"\w* law, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* goeth forth \w at|strong="H0413"\w* thy bidding, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* honourable \w in|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*?

\w Did|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w consult|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w*? \w far|strong="H2486"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w*: \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* suspect \w such|strong="H2063"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w against|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*, \w either|strong="H3588"\w* \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Dying|strong="H4191"\w* thou shalt \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, Achimelech, thou \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w messengers|strong="H5650"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w Turn|strong="H5437"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w told|strong="H0559"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Doeg|strong="H1673"\w*: \w Turn|strong="H5437"\w* thou, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w fall|strong="H6293"\w* \w upon|strong="H6293"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Doeg|strong="H1673"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Edomite|strong="H0130"\w* \w turned|strong="H5437"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w fell|strong="H6293"\w* \w upon|strong="H6293"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* slew \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w eighty-five|strong="H8084"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w wore|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* Nobe \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, both \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w children|strong="H5768"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* sucklings, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* ass, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

But \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Achimelech \w the|strong="H0310"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Achitob, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w*, \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*,
